data.eml:eml: Two new species of Molophilus Curtis from the Mediterranean and Transcaucasia (Diptera, Limoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stary, Jaroslav, Obona, Jozef (2019): Two new species of Molophilus Curtis from the Mediterranean and Transcaucasia (Diptera, Limoniidae). ZooKeys 871: 49-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.34559, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.34559
